name: SendInvitations
description:
Invite users to join the organization via email.

This tool sends invitation emails to specified users, asking them to join the organization. It should be used when you need to extend an invite to new members through email.

parameters.name: user_invitations_data
parameters.description: A JSON array of user objects to invite. Each user object should include an 'id' and 'type'. 'type' must be 'users'.

id.description: A unique identifier that represents the user.
